name: Unpredictable Shapeshifting
description:
A (barely) finished Ludum Dare 49 Compo game, with the theme: Unstable.

Hunters enter a forest to shoot a pack of wolves, but one among them is a shapeshifter. You randomly change from hunter to a wolf. As a hunter you can shoot wolves, while your wolf form is fast and has melee attack. Be the last one alive!

Made with Godot 3.3.3. Project files are available as a download.
